name: Gustavinho em o Enigma da Esfinge
name_original: Gustavinho em o Enigma da Esfinge
description: Produced by 44 Bico Largo, Gustavinho in the Riddle of the Sphinx is a Brazilian puzzle adventure game devised by Ale McHaddo, starring Marisa Orth as Cleopatra. The game tells the story of a boy who ended up calling a lord a mummy and was sent to Ancient Egypt. To return home, Gustavinho will face several challenges and travel through the Africa of the pharaohs and the Europe of Julius Caesar.
